casebody.data:
STEWART
v.
WEBB. No. 274P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Robert K. Stewart, Marion, for Stewart, Robert K. Amy Kunstling Irene, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Maureen Krueger, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of October 2015 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
